data.name: Breach of Contract Reloaded
data.detailed_description:
Breach of Contract Reloaded is a multiplayer First-Person Shooter Game with a ton to offer.
MAIN FEATURES

  • Server Browser
  • Team Deathmatch, Free-For-All, and Domination
  • In-Game Weapon Unlocks
  • 6 Maps
  • 6-12 players per match
  • Over a dozen weapons
  • Chat System (Team/Global)

Breach of Contract Reloaded is a new innovative First-Person Shooter Online Game. Compete with players all over the world. Battle against players in multiple terrains from outdoor environments to indoors. Epic battles from 6-12 player matches allowing absolute chaos. With so many players to kill and XP to earn to unlock new weapons for battle what are you waiting for? Put endless amounts of time into the game.

The game is centered around the idea of simplistic yet addictive gameplay. With multiple different game modes to play you can pick your battles and fight in totally different scenarios. Earn weapons in this game to make you the best. Fight your way to the top!

Discord Link
https://discord.gg/YYWP7M3

Progressive Ranking System
Earn more weapons by killing enemy players. Accumulate XP(Experience) and unlock new weapons.

Gamepad Support
Plugin an Xbox One Gamepad controller and you're all good to go!
With controls listed as follows:
Start - Pause
LBumper - Aim
RBumper - Fire
X - Reload
X Held - Heal With Syringe
A - Jump
B - Equip New Weapons
Left Analog Stick - Move
Left Analog Stick Held - Sprint Movement
Right Analog Stick - Look Around
Right Analog Stick Pressed - Crouch
Y - Change Weapon
B - Change Weapon after Y pressed

data.short_description: Breach of Contract Reloaded is the new Multiplayer FPS Game you've been wanting! With game modes Team Deathmatch, Free-For-All, and Bomb Defuse, and 6 maps. Be prepared, it's coming.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon(TM) RX 460 Graphics or Nvidia Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit Architecture
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or Amd Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit Architecture

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
